name: Flafla2Java/LWJGL
comment: Holy **** this one's fun! Also a cool, original idea, which is great since so many people are taking this contest a bit too literally and posting actual flappy bird clones. You should consider porting this to mobile!

name: HarryCrumb
comment: I love this one. Really good job. Little details like the quick combos you can do really improve it. Feels slick in a Super Meat Boy kind of way.

name: Stinkfest
comment: That's super cool guys! Love everything about it :)

name: whatevermansure
comment: Great game! Kind of like those ninja games except you have to keep kicking.

name: April B.
comment: I LOVE THIS GAME! Some might find it frustrating and repetitive, but I've always had a soft spot for ancient arcade games. It's just soooo incredibly rewarding when you beat that high score

name: Bruce S.
comment: Super fun, Difficult, Can't wait for the mobile version!

name: KangarooBox
comment: This game is super! This game is super simple, super hard, and super fun!

name: Charlie S.
comment: this is the best thing ive got on my computer

name: Plfree6p
comment: I'm really enjoying this challenging, fun and addictive game. Constantly trying to beat my high score the creators did a great job creating a unique character for a creative game!

name: @martinreimer
comment: It's like megaman meets Flappy Bird... so good.

name: Vimukthi A.
comment: brilliant game :) can anyone beat 117?

name: FlickxFlackxFilms
comment: AWESOME!!!!!!!!

name: Steven S.
comment: Difficult but really enjoyable

name: Christian A.
comment: This is harder than flappy bird... but soo fun, thank u

name: Robert V.
comment: Really Hard but it's awesome when you can beat the high score [28]

name: Brian L.
comment: It's hard, but it feels so rewarding to beat your high score! [20]!

name: Richard H.
comment: Man, this game is *super* hard AND tons of fun! Thanx!

name: @AlcotSirk
comment: Best Robot Murder Tunnel of the Year so far

name: @typocracy
comment: This is pretty awesome guys, well done!

name: @tb
comment: BTW, the game itself is awesome! Go checkout KICKBOT!

name: @rogueNoodle
comment: Kick Bot is a great, rage-inducing #flappyjam entry from @TwoScoopGames!

name: Ryan S.
comment: I hated it.

name: Aaron S.
comment: Super fun! Great to see new games that don't have "flappy" in the title.

name: Mary W.
comment: This might be my new obsession...

name: Gregory L.
comment: Sir, I think you might've just rivaled flappy bird with this game.

name: David D.
comment: I'd rather punch myself in the head. Well, maybe I'll try one more time
